reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major arthritic conditions: Osteoarthritis (~70 per 100k), Rheumatoid arthritis (~0.8 per 100k), Psoriatic arthritis (~0.6 per 100k), Gout (~2.0 per 100k), Lupus arthritis (~0.5 per 100k), other arthritides (~15 per 100k) = ~90 per 100k total. Heterogeneous category with significant geographic and age-related variation.
